title: Pset_FireSuppressionTerminalTypeBreechingInlet
description: Symmetrical pipe fitting that unites two or more inlets into a single pipe (BS6100 330 114 adapted).

BreechingInletType.title: BreechingInletType
BreechingInletType.description: Defines the type of breeching inlet.

InletDiameter.title: InletDiameter
InletDiameter.description: The inlet diameter of the breeching inlet.

OutletDiameter.title: OutletDiameter
OutletDiameter.description: The outlet diameter of the breeching inlet.

CouplingType.title: CouplingType
CouplingType.description: Defines the type coupling on the inlet of the breeching inlet.

HasCaps.title: HasCaps
HasCaps.description: Does the inlet connection have protective caps.
